acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill embedded abstract classes if a concrete type has been specified
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillEmbeddedAbstractClassesIfAConcreteTypeHasBeenSpecified

test-step.description: When I add a specific type for an abstract type or interface
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.EmbeddedAbstractFieldTestPojo
Then the Object uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.EmbeddedAbstractFieldTestPojo@3de8af4d should not be null
Then the inner pojo instance variable should not be null
